item.title: Magma: A Foundation Model for Multimodal AI Agents
item.description: Magma: a new foundation model for multimodal AI agents excels at bridging verbal and spatial intelligence, achieving state-of-the-art performance across various tasks, including UI navigation and robo…

item.title: GenEx: Generating an Explorable World
item.description: GenEx generates explorable 3D worlds from a single image, enabling embodied AI agents to explore and learn.
